name: DeleteBreakType
description:
Deletes an existing `BreakType`.

A `BreakType` can be deleted even if it is referenced from a `Shift`.

id.description: The UUID for the `BreakType` being deleted.

$block:
The response to a request to delete a `BreakType`. The response might contain a set 
of `Error` objects if the request resulted in errors.

$ul: **errors**: Any errors that occurred during the request.
